Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the interior is slightly ribbed and spotted with a brown resinous deposit, the exterior is partially grooved, covered with a self-slip and remains of one line of red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394209) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394209)
